overview: Take a trip to find the great magician and physic Ivan, who promises to solve all of your health and love problems. But watch out because his methods are a little unorthodox and he takes an extremely hands on approach. He might be the last person you should go to if you have marriage problems, heâ€™ll hypnotize you then go off and fuck your wife. But that might be just what your love life needs, some hot kinky sex!
title: Mago
